title: No Scoped Type Hierarchy on Binary Projects
description: When I hit F4 on a binary project selection (e.g., I don't understand it.
OB: When hitting F4 on a binary project selection, no scoped type hierarchy is displayed.
EB: I expect to see the scoped type hierarchy when I hit F4 on a binary project selection.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the software.
2. Navigate to a binary project selection.
3. Press the F4 key. The scoped type hierarchy should be displayed, but it is not.
